description_text:
Hello,

with this order i would get 6 haptics reactors, is that correct?
[image: image.png]


It would fit the 3x 2 Set Pedals...are the mounting is also included for
the haptics?

Thanks a lot.
Regards,
Martin

conversations.body_text: 你好，马丁·哈默， 您好，请提供您的订单号以便我确认。

Hello, i didnt order yet.

I want to know before i order it.

Thanks and regards,
Martin

Am Mo., 22. Dez. 2025 um 13:02 Uhr schrieb service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com>:

> 你好，马丁·哈默，
> 您好，请提供您的订单号以便我确认。
>
>
>
>

Hi Martin Hammer,    The image shows two Vam Pro sets (3-pack), but the actual two-pedal set option is listed as a 2-pack, priced as a 2-pack set. This may be a display error on the website, so there should only be four in total.  Merry Christmas!
